inputFields.name: categoryId
inputFields.description: ID of the event category

inputFields.name: cityLocations
inputFields.description: City Boroughs or Neighborhoods Locations

inputFields.name: doConsolidateEvents
inputFields.description: If true, consolidate events in series and return the latest event of the series/recurring events

inputFields.name: doPromotePaypalEvents
inputFields.description: If true, get a paypal event and put it into third search result

inputFields.name: endDateRange
inputFields.description: The latest date of event

inputFields.name: endTime
inputFields.description: The end time of day to filter events to.

inputFields.name: eventType
inputFields.description: Type of event: online or not

inputFields.name: isHappeningNow
inputFields.description: Whether the event is in progress

inputFields.name: joinReasons
inputFields.description: List of reasons to filter events more further

inputFields.name: lat
inputFields.description: Latitude of the location of an event

inputFields.name: lon
inputFields.description: Longitude if the location of an event

inputFields.name: prioritizeRsvps
inputFields.description: Prioritize groups with recent RSVP

inputFields.name: query
inputFields.description: A pattern string for searching by occurrence in an event title

inputFields.name: radius
inputFields.description: The search radius relative to location (in miles)

inputFields.name: startDateRange
inputFields.description: The earliest date of event

inputFields.name: startTime
inputFields.description:
The start time of day to filter events from.
For every event between the startDateRange and endDateRange, the startTime is used to filter further
by time. Ex: Get all events in January. And from that, get events that start at 9 am.

inputFields.name: timeDecayOffset
inputFields.description: Prioritize groups with recent activity

inputFields.name: timeDecayScale
inputFields.description: Prioritize groups with recent activity

inputFields.name: topicCategoryId
inputFields.description: The id of topicCategory [from topic taxonomy]. Used if categoryId is empty.

inputFields.name: useTimeOfDayEmbedding
inputFields.description: Use time of day embedding
